column2: caption="Isilmë of Númenor" by [[:Category:Images by Elawen Altariel

column1: }}'''Isilmë''' was the second daughter of [[Tar-Elendil]], fourth [[King of Númenor]]. Because of the law of [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agnatic_primogeniture agnatic primogeniture] her younger brother would take up the [[Sceptre]] as [[Tar-Meneldur]]. Almost nothing is known of her life.<ref>{{UT
